summary: Six blind Tibetan teenagers climb the Lhakpa-Ri peak of Mount Everest, led by seven-summit blind mountain-climber Erik Weihenmayer.
cast: Gavin Attwood|Sally Berg|Sonam Bhumtso|Dachung|Jeff Evans|Gyenshen|Stefani Jackenthal|Paul Kronenberg|Kyila|Charley Mace|Steven Mace|Chris Morris|Tashi Pasang|Kami Tenzing Sherpa|Cornelia Tenberken|Sabriye Tenberken|Tenzin|Nguyen-Toan Tran|Ed Weihenmayer|Erik Weihenmayer|Michael Brown
keywords: title directed by female|mountain climbing|mount everest|mountain climber|prosopagnosia
title: Blindsight
